summary: Testing of XoW Dashboard - Sessions tab AI summary, Visitors tab conversation labels, and video playback seeking functionality. All 12 backend tests passed. UI features verified working.

minor.issue: FFmpeg overlay fails when input video is invalid (moov atom not found) - expected behavior, falls back to original video

issues: Some visitor labels show 'No media' instead of Play button when recording has no video/audio - this is expected behavior

critical_code_review_comments: Sessions tab correctly shows AI summary without detailed speaker breakdown - WORKING
Visitors tab shows conversation labels with Play buttons and Start Time - WORKING
Video playback seeking works - clicking on Visitor (0:25) correctly seeks video to 25.39 seconds
FFmpeg overlay function has proper font paths and logging configured
/api/dashboard/recordings returns visitor data with start_time for video seeking
/api/dashboard/visitors returns visitor badges with required fields

test_credentials.note: No special credentials needed - public dashboard UI

seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing test recordings
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working: 1) Sessions tab shows only AI summary with 'Host Identified' badge, no speaker-by-speaker breakdown. 2) Visitors tab shows conversation labels with Label, Start Time, Summary, and Play button. 3) Video seeking works - clicking Play on visitor label opens modal and clicking speaker segments in sidebar correctly seeks video to the corresponding timestamp (tested: Visitor at 0:25 -> video seeks to 25.39s).

features_tested.sessions_tab_ai_summary: PASS - Shows overall AI summary without detailed speaker breakdown
features_tested.visitors_tab_conversation_labels: PASS - Shows labels with Play buttons and Start Time
features_tested.video_playback_seeking: PASS - Clicking speaker segment (Visitor 0:25) correctly seeks video to 25.39s
features_tested.dashboard_recordings_api: PASS - Returns visitor data with start_time
features_tested.dashboard_visitors_api: PASS - Returns visitor badges with required fields
features_tested.video_upload_endpoint: PASS - Accepts video files for upload
features_tested.ffmpeg_overlay_configuration: PASS - FFmpeg installed, fonts available, logging in place

sessions_tab.key_insights: Shows bullet points of key insights

visitors_tab.conversation_labels: Shows visitor name, booth name, date, sentiment, summary
visitors_tab.play_button: Opens video modal and seeks to start_time
visitors_tab.no_media_indicator: Shows 'No media' when recording has no video/audio

video_modal.speaker_segments: Clickable segments that seek video to speaker start time
video_modal.conversation_segments: Clickable segments that seek video to conversation start time
